QuestData.Title: The Mosh'Ogg Bounty
QuestData.Description: Say... have you heard about the ogres? I got a hot tip from some fella' named Mok'thardin that some $r schmuck in a ridiculous $c getup found this ogre hand, and...$b$b<Skeezy trails off as he looks you over.>$b$bWhat was I just saying? Oh yes... some $g SWASHBUCKLING HERO: BREATHTAKING HEROINE; found this ogre hand, and Mok'thardin thinks it means that the ogres have some special artifact. I've seen them guarding a chest up in some ruins behind their mound. Care to fetch it for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain the Mosh'Ogg Bounty from the ruins behind the Mosh'Ogg Ogre Mound.
QuestData.CompletionText: Why is it that the OGRES always find the priceless artifacts?
QuestData.RewardText: <Skeezy struggles fruitlessly to open the box.>$b$bThose ogres really know how to close a treasure chest, I'll tell you what. A box is useless to me, $g hero: my dear;. We're going to need to find a way into this crate.
